import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './CartItem.css' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import cross from '../Assets/cross.png' const CartItems = () => { const {getTotalCartAmount, all_Product,cartItems,removeFromCart} =useContext(ShopContext); return (

Product

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_Product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0) { return (

{e.name}

{e.new_price}

${e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}}/>
) } return null; })}

cart Totals

Subtatal

${getTotalCartAmount()}

Shipping Fee

Free

Total

${getTotalCartAmount()}

if you have a promo code, enter it here

) } export default CartItems;
